data.title: China chengdu education e learning market
data.meta_description: China chengdu  education e learning market  - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
1. By: Dr. BikashKali Das Email . id : bikashkali023@gmail.com , bikashkali023@hotmail.com +91 9566688132 Dated - January 2016 KEY WORDS: West China Medical Centre, Sichuan University, Bangalore sister city, fortune 500 Companies, Jinjiang district, Chengdu marketing, Tianfu Square, incubation park, Healthcare IT, LMS, e-learning, m-learning.

2. Content  -About the city  -IT areas of the city  -know-how Chengdu university of technology, Jinxin medical group , Sichuan university, west china medical centre, Jinjiang area . -a brief about the market in chengdu. Pic: tianfu square

3. About the city.  Chengdu is the capital of southwestern China's Sichuan province. The city is home to the famous Chengdu Research Base of Giant Panda Breeding.  Area: 12,132 km²  Population: 4.334 million (2000) UN data  Province: Sichuan  Mayor: Tang Liangzhi  Divisions

4.  -County-level 10 districts, 4 county-level cities, 5 counties Sister City with Bangalore,India  Major IT areas : Tianfu Square, Incubation Park, Hi –tech zone

5. Jinjiang district  Jinjiang district Government is responsible for its development also for providing R&D grants .  It has won include Top Ten Area of Modern Services in China, China’s Model District for Harmonious Community, China’s Experimental District of Innovative Community Management and Service and Top Urban Area in the Chinese Mainland for Investments from HK SAR.

6.  The district prioritizes the Industry of modern services in its economic development and has formed a well-developed system of Modern Commerce, Cultural & Innovative Industry, Financing and Life Services.  It has a large number of 5-star hotels.  The district has the largest cluster of financing institutions in western China and most of the Overseas Banks and Insurance Companies in Chengdu have found their settlement in the district.

7.  It is the host place of the 12th Fortune Global Forum and has attracted 103 Fortune Global 500 Companies and more than 300 Multinational Companies to settle down within its area, boasting the largest number of Fortune Global 500 companies and Multinational Companies among the urban districts in western China.  The policy openness of the Government in city reconstruction and relocation has won a national fame and public praise. Jinjiang district government Miss. Dorris Xiao with Radha madam

8.  The head office of the fast food chain Dicos is in Jinjiang District.  China Resources Beverage, the distributor of C'estbon water, has its southwest regional office .  All Nippon Airways operates its Chengdu Office in the district, in Tower 2 of Plaza Central. In all and all Jinjiang district is the emerging district with feasible govt. support for establishment by the startups.

9. Chengdu Jinxin Healthcare Investment Management Group Ltd (Jinxin).  Jinxin has opened international hospitals all over Chengdu area and are in search of innovative health care IT Tcompanies to give them a break.  Ramsay Health Care, after signed a provisional agreement with an operator of five hospitals in the city of Chengdu.  Along with its joint venture partner Sime Darby, Ramsay will partner with Chinese company Jinxin. Chairman and vicechairman of Jinxin With Radha madam

10. Jinxin medical group Hospitals

11. Sichuan University  National University directly under the Ministry of Education (MOE).  It is also one of the State 211 Project and 985 Project universities enjoying privileged construction in the Ninth Five-Year Plan period.  Has 2 national key labs,  6 national engineering centers,  5 ministerial (MOE) key labs,  35 provincial key labs,  10 ministerial and provincial centers,  4 key research bases for humanities and social sciences  4 clinical research bases at the national level. The university has invested significantly in research, teaching and medical equipment, with a total value of about 530 million RMB.

12.  SCU has undertaken and completed a considerable number of national, ministerial and regional Research projects, and has made many achievements that are rated first class in China and bear significant international influence. The university publishes more than 4,000 research papers annually.  In 2002, the university applied for 121 patents, 102 out of which were invention-oriented, making it number eighth among peer schools.

13.  Institute of South Asian Studies, Sichuan University founded in 1978 upon the erstwhile India Studies Office ISAS enjoys the most complete collection of research data for South Asia studies in China and boasts its rich academic achievements. The institute has 19 full-time researchers, and most of them have furthered their academic careers in the U.S, U.K., India, and Belgium for at least 1 year. The present Executive Director of ISAS is Professor Li Tao. Delegation from Sichuan University, China, visited IDSA for a half-day seminar on ‘India-China relations and current regional developments’ on September 11, 2015. Leader of MOU China with Radha madam

14. West china medical centre  Regulates under Sichuan University and is administered by the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China. The Centre is ranked 3rd in China for medicine. It is one of the 8 key medical universities under the direct control of Ministry of Education of China. Dean west china med centre International department /HOD Radiology : Miss Zou Lin

15. The Center consists of five colleges:  West China College of Basic and Forensic Medicine  West China School of Medicine  West China College of Stomatology  West China School of Public Health  West China School of Pharmacy  http://wcums.scu.edu.cn/ab out_en.asp

16. Chengdu University of Technology  2 State Key Laboratories (1 joint program),  2 Key Laboratories of Sichuan Province,  1 Key Laboratory of the Ministry of Education,  1 Key Laboratory of Sichuan Provincial Universities,  1 Philosophy and Social Science Research Base of Sichuan Province. With Prof .Leonard Gordon

17.  2 Key Laboratories of Land and Resources (fostering),  2 Field Bases for Scientific Observation and Research under the Ministry of Land and Resources, and  1 Philosophy and Social Science Popularization Base of Sichuan Province.  The university is running four Sino-foreign cooperative education programs with two British universities

18. To Dig Smoothly to the market PLANNING 1. Charting out the needs . 2. Business canvas model for Chengdu China market 3. The important contacts. 4. Selecting the area /district of operation . 5. Channelizing the sources. 6. Using R & D Grants help from district governments. 7. Marketing.

19. Some important persons Director of Education Malayasia: Dr.Mohd Rozi Ismail Lingtao Kong : Chairman of World Confuscious foundation Consolate General Vietnam Mr. Tony Riggio :CEO Silk route exhibition Chengdu.STAGEWORKS TV

20. Silk Route exhibition centre a glance of an Australian Company in Chengdu
